title: Cairns stabbing: eight children found dead in home â rolling report | Australia news | The Guardian
summary: prime minister calls deaths `` gut wrenching ''
queensland premier calls on queenslanders to support each other .
queensland police confirm deaths of eight children .

text: members of the public lay flowers at a memorial in the park next the home .
hitchcock/getty images

documents.title: the day 's events in cairns
text: a traumatic day in cairns to round off a rotten week .
here 's what we know : police were called to a house in murray street , in the cairns suburb of manoora , at around 11.30am .
they found a 34-year-old woman with a chest injury along with the bodies of eight children aged between 18 months and 15 years .
the children had reportedly been stabbed to death , although police said they could not confirm this was the method of murder for all of the children .
the 34-year-old woman is the mother of seven of the eight children , police said .
lisa thaiday , a cousin of the woman , said the children are all siblings and are of torres strait islander background .
police have said there are no formal suspects at this time , with investigation ongoing .
however , they stress the public is not at risk .
tony abbott called the tragedy an unspeakable crime .
he added that these are trying days for our country .

bill shorten , the opposition leader , said it was just the saddest tragedy at the end of one of the toughest weeks for our nation , in reference to the sydney hostage siege that left two fo the hostages dead .
queensland police superintendent russell miller has said there are some very unhelpful social media posts surrounding the case .
there 's video of him speaking here .
qps media unit ( @ qpsmedia ) video : superintendent russell miller 's message to the cairns community following the # manoora tragedy .
some more from asnicar 's press conference .

the detective inspector said : we do n't have any persons who are formally suspects , it 's early days , we 're speaking to a range of people , those who have have interactions with the family in the past two to three days .
a man was seen pacing outside the house , a reporter says .
was he first on the scene ?
i 'm not 100 % sure of that , it 's a possibility .
we beleive we 've identified that man and we 're speaking to him presently .
he 's not a suspect at this stage .
we are talking to him to get a version of what occured .
asnicar says the mother of seven of the eight children is the 34-year-old woman in hospital .
he ca n't confirm that all of the children were stabbed .
he 's asked if the woman in a suspect .
as i said , anyone who 's had any involvement at all is a person of interest , we 're not talking about naming suspects at this stage .
around a dozen police specialists , including forensic and intelligence staff , are being flown up from brisbane .
asnicar admits this is a big challenge for the cairns police force .
this is certainly a tragic and traumatic event with so many people deceased in one place .
it 's right up there with one of the most serious things i 've ever had to deal with .
detective inspector bruno asnicar of the queensland police has just given a press conference where he said there are no formal suspects at this time .
he added that the 34-year-old woman in hospital with a chest wound is the mother of seven of the eight deceased children .
none of the children have been formally identified , however .
the police are about to hold a media conference and a key question is likely to be around the suspected perpetrator of this crime .
the 34-year-old woman in hospital with a chest wound is not in police custody .
the police have already said the is no need for public concern over a further attack .
more may become clear soon .
this really is grim .
an awful week , both in australia and internationally , whichever way you look at it .
as bridie mentioned before , lifeline is there for those who are struggling with how things have unfolded .
the 24 hour phone line is 131 114 and the website is
scott forbes , of the cairns post , has appeared on the abc to report that the family was well regarded by neighbours .
meanwhile , labor leader bill shorten has released a statement on the tragedy : this is just the saddest tragedy at the end of one of the toughest weeks for our nation .
to the people who knew , loved and lost these beautiful children , none of us can imagine your pain , but all of us are with you in your grief .
how something like this could occur is beyond anyone 's comprehension .
there is no greater evil than the killing of children .
this is a time for all of us to tell the people we care for , how much we love them .
go home , hug your children , call your parents - because life is too short and too fragile .
for those in cairns and are minded to go , there will be a candlelight vigil for the dead children at 6pm at munro martin park .
details here .
thanks to bridie .
what a week .
gavin king , the state mp for cairns , has just appeared on the abc .
king , a former editor at large at the cairns post , says there is a sense of numbness in the local community .
this area has had its ups and downs , but that 's not out of the ordinary , most communities have their ups and downs .
i think something like this is such a shock , it 's completely out of the blue .
it 's completely incomprehensible .
king notes the sydney hostage siege and the death of 18-year-old daniel smith , who was mauled by a shark near port douglas , this week , calling it one of the darkest weeks he can recall .
it will take some time to get to grips with the scale of what 's happened here .
ahead of the police conference in about 45 minutes i will hand over to my colleague oliver milman .
queensland 's opposition leader , annastacia palaszczuk , has expressed sadness for the families of victims in a tweet .
annastaciapalaszczuk ( @ annastaciamp ) the deaths of young children in cairns is absolutely heartbreaking news .
our thoughts are with family and friends of the children .
annastaciapalaszczuk ( @ annastaciamp ) my thoughts are also with police and emergency services personnel responding to the tragic situation in cairns .
we have footage of the media conference detective inspector bruno asnicar gave near the house in cairns where the bodies of eight children were found today .
another media conference is due in an hour .
detective inspector bruno asnicar speaks in cairns .
abc reporter sharnie kim is in murray street in cairns , the street of the home where the bodies of the eight children were found .
she is reporting on the distressing scene there .
part of the road has been blocked off and a police paddy wagon with lights flashing is at the property as well .

i guess the most confronting thing is just seeing relatives and friends of the victims arriving on the scene and learning about these terrible events and being comforted by police , just sounding so unbelievably distressed .

documents.title: bodies of eight children found in cairns - what we know
text: the bodies of eight children have been found at a home in cairns in far north queensland .
here is what we know : police were called to the house in murray street , in the cairns suburb of manoora , before midday after reports of a woman with serious injuries .
on examination of the house they found the bodies of eight children aged between 18 months and 15 years .
the children had all been stabbed a 34-year-old woman is being treated for injuries in hospital and is assisting police with their inquiries .
she is not in police custody .
aap is quoting lisa thaiday , a cousin of the woman , as saying the children are all siblings and it was their older brother , 20 , who discovered their bodies .
the premier , campbell newman , has called on queenslanders to support each other through the next few days .
the prime minister , tony abbott , has called the deaths gut wrenching and an unspeakable crime .
police will address media at 4.30pm queensland time which is 5.30pm aedt .

documents.title: prime minister calls deaths `` gut wrenching ''
text: the prime minister , tony abbott , says the deaths of the eight children is an unspeakable crime and heartbreaking .
he released a statement saying : all parents would feel a gut-wrenching sadness at what has happened .
this is an unspeakable crime .
these are trying days for our country .
tonight , there will be tears and prayers across our country for these children .
my thoughts are with the queensland police and all who have to respond to this terrible situation .

documents.title: queensland premier calls on queenslanders to support each other
text: the queensland premier , campbell newman , calls on queenslanders to reach out to each other in the coming days , saying the death of the eight children is a tragedy .
he said in a statement : i am deeply saddened and shocked by the tragic events in cairns today .
my thoughts and prayers are with the family and friends of those concerned .
newman said the events would have an impact on emergency service workers and police officers and the acting ministers in queensland would ensure they get the support they need .
indeed , the whole cairns community and the people of queensland will feel the effects of this tragedy , particularly at a time of year when families come together .
i ask that all queenslanders reach out to those who may need support in coming days and do not hesitate to seek professional assistance if needed .
warren entsch , the federal member for leichhardt , which covers cairns , has labelled the incident a terrible domestic tragedy , my colleague shalailah medhora reports .
entsch told sky news the torres strait islander community will be rallying around the relatives of the injured and deceased .
family members will gather and support and comfort family , and that support will continue until and after the funeral .
at times like this , families really come together .
it shows you the bonds of the family .
entsch said the government stands ready to help .
it 's almost incomprehensible that something like this could happen .
we will walk with them , we will sit with them and support them through this terrible tragedy .
i do n't really have the words to describe the depths of how horrific this story is .
it comes at the end of a very difficult week for australia .
it seems the right moment to insert lifeline 's details for anyone struggling at the end of this awful , news-heavy week , in the lead-up to christmas or just in general .
the 24 hour phone line is 131 114 and the website is
aap is quoting lisa thaiday , a cousin of the woman in hospital , as saying the eight dead children are all siblings and it was their older 20-year-old brother who discovered their bodies .
i 'm going to see him now , he needs comforting , she said .
she described the family and extended relatives as close-knit .
we 're a big family and most of us are from the [ torres ] strait , she said .
i just ca n't believe it .
we just found out [ about ] those poor babies .
about 20 to 30 people , including neighbours and locals , could be seen to be visibly upset and comforting each other at the scene .
specialist police officers are travelling from brisbane to cairns to help with the investigation .
the house where the children 's bodies were found is a crime scene and will likely remain so for days .
channel 10 reporter hugh riminton has tweeted this photo of the house where the body of the eight children were found .
hugh riminton ( @ hughriminton ) a 34yo woman is helping police after eight children were fatally stabbed in this cairns home details @ twitterid

arthur sinodinos , who announced his resignation from the frontbench today , has expressed his condolences to the cairns incident , saying it puts into perspective any individual difficulties he 's experienced .
sinodinos passed on his sympathies in an interview on sky news .
lisa thaiday , a cousin of the 34-year-old woman , told aap at the scene the children were all siblings .
the woman was their mother , she said .
thaiday said another sibling , a 20-year-old man , arrived home to find his brothers and sisters dead inside the house .
a cairns post reporter has said it was a family friend who found the children .
scott forbes , from the local newspaper the cairns post , has told abc news 24 that the bodies of the children were discovered by a family friend who was visiting the house ahead of christmas .
detective inspector bruno asnicar said forensic officers were examining the murray street house now .
he himself has not yet been inside , but has been briefed on the number of victims , my colleague calla wahlquist reports .
i can tell you that at this stage i believe there 's eight .
as i told you at this stage the scene is locked down , that could go up or down .
asnicar said he believed the ages to be between 18 months and 15 years .
i can tell you that i walked into this 10 minutes ago , i 'm very new to this myself .
aniscar said the police who first responded to the incident were distressed but acted professionally .
these events are extremely distressing for everyone , of course , and police officers are n't immune to that , we 're human beings as well .
but the police we have here are very highly trained and professional i 'm very happy with the response .
this will be done to the nth degree and we will cover every angle .
when asked about reports a man had been seen standing in the front yard of the property , asnicar said it was the first i 've heard of it .

cairns detective inspector bruno asnicar has warned the number of dead children could go up or down from eight , according to my colleague calla wahlquist who has transcribed the media conference he held in the street .
he would not say whether the children were all members of the same family , or whether the 34-year-old woman , who was found seriously injured and taken to hospital , was related to them .
he said the woman was in a stable condition in hospital and was helping police with their inquiries , but was not in police custody .

asnicar said it was too early for him to comment on the detail of the crime , but said : as it stands at the moment there 's no need for the public to be concerned , other than it 's a tragic , tragic incident .
a murray street resident , stephen lillingstone , has told my colleague joshua robertson the incident occurred on a section of the street that was almost exclusively publicly owned housing .
that area where it is is a bit rowdy , he said .
you get your flare-ups and everything .
the acting greens leader , adam bandt , expresses condolences : adam bandt ( @ adambandt ) terrible news from cairns adds to a week of tragedy .
heart goes out to all who are sharing this sadness .
detective inspector bruno asnicar has held a press conference in cairns .
there was no livefeed but we are on standby for a transcript .
we do know that asnicar said the woman assisting police with their inquiries from her hospital bed in cairns is not in police custody .
police were called to the home in murray street in cairns about 11.20am after reports of a woman with serious injuries .
during an examination of the house they discovered the bodies of the eight children .
officers from cairns criminal investigation branch and the child protection and investigations unit are on scene , as well as forensics officers .
murray street has been closed .
police say they will not release further information at this stage .

documents.title: queensland police confirm deaths of eight children
text: queensland police media have released a statement confirming the deaths of eight children in cairns .
they were all stabbed .
they were aged between 18 months and 15 years old .
the bodies of the children were found at a house in murray street in the cairns suburb of manoora .
a 34-year-old woman is assisting police with their enquiries .

police are yet to officially confirm the number of deaths or the nature of injuries.however , a far north regional crime co-ordinator , detective inspector bruno asnicar , told guardian australia the public had nothing to fear from the incident , which officers now had in hand .
abc reporter sharnie kim is at the scene and has posted this photo .
sharnie kim ( @ sharniekim ) murray street in manoora # cairns blocked off .
police say 8 people including children killed @ twitterid @ twitterid
queensland police are investigating a horrific scene in cairns in which at least seven children have been stabbed to death .
the children are reportedly aged between three and 14 .

Queensland premier calls on Queenslanders to support each other

Queensland police confirm deaths of eight children

bulletin.text: Eight children aged between 18 months and 15 years have been stabbed to death in north Queensland.
¢ Police detective speaks to media of distressing scene audio.
